structure.unit: Manufacture And Sale Of Gas And Electricity

law.catch_line: Vote Of City To Acquire Plant
law.text: A city shall not acquire such a plant until authorized by a two thirds vote of its city council, or of a majority of the commissioners if the city government consists of a commission, passed in each of two consecutive municipal years and thereafter ratified by a majority of the voters at an annual or special city election. If such a vote is not ratified, no similar vote shall be submitted for ratification within one year thereafter.
